title: Liberty Men's Brown Slippers
body: Pros:  Comfortable Design: Liberty Men's Brown Slippers are incredibly comfortable, providing excellent cushioning and support for your feet.  Durable Material: Made from high-quality materials, these slippers are built to last, ensuring long-term usage without wear and tear.  Stylish Appearance: The brown color and design make these slippers visually appealing, suitable for various casual occasions.  Non-Slip Sole: The slip-resistant sole provides a good grip, making these slippers ideal for both indoor and outdoor use, even on slippery surfaces.  Easy to Clean: The slippers are easy to clean, allowing for hassle-free maintenance and ensuring they look good for a long time.  Cons:  Limited Color Options: The availability of color options might be limited, which could be a drawback for those who prefer a wider range of choices.  Sizing Issues: Like with any footwear, sizing can be a concern. Some users might find it challenging to get the perfect fit, leading to discomfort if the size isn't right.  Lack of Arch Support: For individuals needing extra arch support due to foot conditions, these slippers might not provide sufficient support, leading to potential discomfort after extended wear.  Not Suitable for Formal Occasions: Due to their casual design, these slippers might not be appropriate for formal events or professional settings, limiting their versatility.  Price: Depending on the budget, some users might find the price slightly higher compared to other similar slippers in the market.

title: 'Great daily use slippers'
body: For the price it's a great slippers. Very comfortable and soft. My foot size is 8 and I ordered the same size, which fits perfectly. title: 'Very poor quality damaged within a couple of days'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. The strap broke within a couple of days of use. Less than 10 days use and strap breaking displays the poor quality of the slipper. Not recommended at all for anyone'

title: 'Open Pack received'
body: The product is good comfortable but the seller has not concealed it in an amazon pack and it was delivered in an open condition as if we are buying it from an showroom in.person.the liberty box wasn't even sealed by an amazon wrap.the delivery person and the depot warehouse are not to know the contents of the pack till it is received by the buyer intact or is liable to be returned.very casual approach by amazon seller.kindly take note of it.
